#

## Mcp Debug

```
uv run mcp dev src/bilibili_mcp_server_full/server.py
```

## Client Debug

```
uv run --with mcp mcp run src/bilibili_mcp_server_full/server.py
```

## 安装

```uvx
"bilibili-mcp-server-full": {
  "command": "uvx",
  "args": [
    "bilibili-mcp-server-full"
  ],
  "disabled": false
}
```
